DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective protocol collect 2-dimensional ( 2D ) screen diagnostic image , 3-dimensional ( 3D ) Digital Breast Tomosynthesis ( DBT ) scan patient mammography examination acquire various commercially available Full Field Digital Mammography ( FFDM ) system Siemens Inspiration DBT system , respectively .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Efficacy Digital Breast Tomosynthesis Imaging
DOC.criteria: All subject enrol collection study must : Provide sign informed consent receive verbal write explanation purpose nature study female , 40 year age old screen mammographic evaluation age 30 old presenting biopsy one follow mammogram : Normal case screen ( BIRADS® 1 , 2 3 ) : screen mammogram include four standard screen view ( RCC , RMLO , LCC LMLO ) , well MLO CC DBT scan breast , Actionable case screen ( BIRADS® 0 , 4 5 ) final BIRADS® 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 5 : screening mammogram four SSVs clinically necessary diagnostic mammographic view , straight lateral projection , roll , magnification view spot compression view , , MLO CC DBT scan breast plus 4 SSVs repeat diagnostic biopsy visit screen image unavailable acquire 45 day prior DBT acquisition , support groundtruth documentation final BIRADS® assessment follow : A one ( 1 ) year FFDM follow without evidence cancer normal case undergo biopsy A six ( 6 ) twelve ( 12 ) month FFDM follow confirm benign status biopsy proven benign case Pathology report either benign malignant biopsy find Subjects follow condition follow procedure exclude study : Pregnant woman woman believe may pregnant try become pregnant . Mastectomy patient Subjects lumpectomy ≤ 5 year prior study entry Inmates ( accordance 45 CFR 46.306 ) mentally disabled individual BIRADS® Category 6 ( e.g. , mammogram perform purpose planning cancer therapy ) BIRADS® Category 4 5 without confirm pathology report consider incomplete Subjects mammogram lack require view view judge technically inadequate consider incomplete case consider MRMC reader study Subjects accrue screen population know United States available follow mammogram one year .
